description: Ceylinco General Insurance Limited Vs Commissioner General of Labour and 04 others before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Ceylinco General Insurance Limited Vs Commissioner General of Labour and 04 others
keywords: Application of Section 13 of the Gratuity Act. -Jurisdiction of the Labour Tribunal to consider the issue of forfeiture of gratuity. -Whether the Commissioner of Labour has jurisdiction to determine issues regarding forfeiture of gratuity. -Types of termination of employment. -Resignation is also a type of termination. -Gratuity entitlement for a termination of employment due to fraud or misappropriation. -Ultra Vires
legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution. -Section 13 of the Gratuity Act. -Section 31 (B) (1) of the Industrial Dispute Act.
